title: Yipee Ki Yay, another chunker medium-width 27.5″ fat bike tire from Terrene for all conditions
content:
Terrene tires just announced their latest tire, the Yipee Ki Yay. Perhaps a nod to one of the great Christmas movies of all time that holds its own year ’round, the Yipee Ki Yay is meant for everything from groomed snow, to ice, loose sand, and dirt. Meaning this is a fat bike tire that

The post Yipee Ki Yay, another chunker medium-width 27.5″ fat bike tire from Terrene for all conditions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
